title: String Reversal
p: String reversal is the process by which a string's characters are arranged backwards, in reverse order.
pre: define reverse text (str) set [output v] to [] repeat (length of (str)) set [output v] to (join (letter ((length of (output)) + (1)) of (str)) (output)) end
define reverse text (str) set [index v] to (0) set [output v] to [] repeat (length of (str)) change [index v] by (1) set [output v] to (join (letter (index) of (str)) (output)) end
p: This script uses blocks from the hidden palette. A modification to the project.json of a project or a modified version of Scratch is required to recreate the script.
